para.text: Dolphin Professional users can rename a method temporary or parameter by simply selecting it in the browser workspace, pressing F2 and entering the new name at the prompt. The method will instantly be rewritten to use the new temporary or parameter name.

This is an example of a "refactoring" being performed by the Refactoring Browser engine. The Refactoring Browser is a free tool made available by The Refactory Inc. This is fully integrated into the native browsers in Dolphin Professional.
